entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @GOPLeader Sweetie... You apparently don't read the news. Almost 140,000 Americans dead from a Virus that your 'leader' called a Hoax. That virus is raging in the denial states. Millions of Americans unemployed. Russia hacking Coronavirus Research centers. Priorities honey, priorities.
